mainText:
People who created something new, who gave to people something that makes
their life easier, who gave their life and soul for the benefits of many
others are called Great people. Steve as an engineer and manager was,
moreover, he is and he will be one of them.

We can say only "Thank you Steve for what you did for all of us". Our
memories and acknowledgement to you will be kept in our hearts.

My condolences to Steve's family.
author: Andrey
